#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
   long long int i,pre,rev,next,a,b,t,curr,count;
   // cin>>t;
 //   while(t--)
    while(1)
    { pre=0; curr=1;
        cin>>a>>b; count=0;
       if(a==0 && b==0)
       {
           break;
       }
        while(1)
        {


        next=pre+curr;
        pre=curr;
        curr=next;
    if(next>=a && next<=b)
    {
        count++;
    }
        if(next>b)
        {
            break;
        }
        }
    cout<<count<<"\n";
    }


    return 0;

}
